content: अग्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अंग्-रन् नलोपः <ls>Uṇ. 2. 28</ls>] {@--1@} First, foremost, chief, best, prominent, principal, pre-eminent; °महिषी chief queen; °वातमासेवमाना <ls>M. 1</ls> front (and hence, fresh) breeze; °आसनं chief seat, seat of honour <ls>Mu. 1. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Excessive, over and above, surplus; supernumerary, projecting (अधिक). --ग्रं {@--1@} ({%a%}) The foremost or topmost point, tip, point (<ab>opp.</ab> मूलं, मध्यं); (<ab>fig.</ab>) sharpness, keenness; धर्मस्य ब्राह्मणो मूलं अग्रं राजन्य उच्यते <ls>Ms. 11. 84</ls>; दर्व्यां अग्रं मूलं मध्यं &c; नासिका° tip of the nose; सूचि° &c.; समस्ता एव विद्या जिह्वाग्रेऽभवन् <ls>K. 346</ls> stood on the tip of the tongue; अमुष्य विद्या रसनाग्रनर्तकी <ls>N. 1. 5.</ls> ({%b%}) Top, summit, surface; कैलास°, पर्वत°, &c. {@--2@} Front, van; अग्रे कृ put in the front or at the head; तामग्रे कृत्वा <ls>Pt. 4</ls> See अग्रे. {@--3@} The best of any kind; स्यंदनाग्रेण with the best of chariots; प्रासादाग्रैः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} Superiority, excellence (उत्कर्ष); अग्रादग्रं रोहति <ls>Tāṇḍya.</ls> {@--5@} Goal, aim, resting place ( आलंबनं); मनुमेकाग्रमासीनं <ls>Ms. 1. 1</ls>, See °भूमि also. {@--6@} Beginning, See अग्रे. {@--7@} A multitude, assemblage. {@--8@} Overplus, excess, surplus; साग्रं स्त्रीसहस्रं <ls>Rām.</ls> 1000 women and more; so साग्रकोटी च रक्षसां. {@--9@} A weight = पल <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--10@} A measure of food given as alms (ब्राह्मणभोजनं occurring in अग्रहार). {@--11@} (Astr.) Amplitude of the sun (°ग्रा, अग्रका also). In compounds as first member meaning ‘the forepart’, ‘front’, ‘tip’ &c.; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} °पादः, --चरणः the forepart of the foot, toe; so °हस्तः, °करः; °पाणिः &c.; °सरोरुहं the topmost lotus <ls>Ku. 1. 16</ls>; °कायः forepart of the body; so °नखं, °नासिका tip of the nail, nose &c., {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} In front, before, ahead.
